title: PokéFort Commands
description:
**Page 1 | Getting Started!**
How to get started on the bot and dex commands. `p!help 1`

**Page 2 | Basic Commands!**
The main commands for the bot and pokemon commands. `p!help 2`

**Page 3 | Trading!**
How to trade pokémon, redeems and credits on the bot. `p!help 3`

**Page 4 | Market!**
How to buy and sell pokémon using the market. `p!help 4`

**Page 5 | Search Options!**
Search options for market searching. `p!help 5`

**Page 6 | Shop and Others!**
Shop commands and some misc commands. `p!help 6`

**Page 7 | Duelling!**
How to duel with your pokémon. `p!help 7`

**Page 8 | Raid!**
Create your own powerful teams and beat the raid boss along with your friends. `p!help 8`

**Page 9 | Auction!**
How to join the global auction, buy and sell special pokémons. `p!help 9`

**Page 10 | Bot commands!**
Bot commands and server commands. `p!help 10`
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Getting Started!
description:
How to get started on the bot and dex commands.

**p!start** | This enters you into the game. You have to use this command first before you can catch any Pokemon.

**p!pick** | Once you've done the start command. You can pick from any of the starters across all of the generations.

**p!catch** <Pokemon Name> | When a wild Pokemon spawns, you will use this command and the correct name to catch it.

**p!hint** | Will display a hint to the currently spawned Pokemon.

**p!select** <Pokemon Number> | Selects which Pokemon will receive XP from chatting and which will battle.

**p!select latest** | Selects your most recently caught or redeemed Pokemon.

**p!nickname** <nickname> | Gives a nickname to your selected Pokemon.

**p!info** | Displays the information of your SELECTED Pokemon.

**p!info latest** | Displays the information of the LATEST Pokemon you've caught.

**p!info** <Pokemon Number> | Displays the information of the Pokemon attached to this number.

**p!dex** <Pokemon Name> | Display a Pokemon with its base stats.

**p!dex shiny** <Pokemon Name> | Displays a shiny version of a Pokemon with its base stats.

**p!dex** | Displays your Pokedex.

**p!dex --caught** | Displays the caught Pokemon.

**p!dex --uncaught** | Displays the uncaught Pokemon.

**p!dex --rewards** | Displays all your dex rewards.

**p!dex claim** <Reward Name> | Collects the specified reward.

**p!dex claim all** | Collects all your dex rewards.
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Basic Commands
description:
The main commands for the bot and pokemon commands.
**p!daily** | Allows you to vote for the Pokéfort server on the Discord Bots site. You get 100 - 1000 credit for doing this every 12 hours.

**p!silence** | Toggles your level up messages.

**p!dm** | Toggles your duel instruction messages.

**p!redeem** <Pokemon Name> | If you have a redeem available, you will receive a Pokemon of the name you entered.

**p!redeem credits** | Sells a redeem you own for 15,000 credits back to the bot itself.

**p!redeemspawn** <Pokemon Name> | Spawns the given pokemon in the channel using your redeem.

**p!pokemon** | Displays a list of your Pokemon. It also displays information, such as Level, Number, IVs, and Nickname.

**p!pokemon --name** <Pokemon Name> | Displays a list of Pokemon you own of that particular name.

**p!pokemon --shiny** | Displays your shiny Pokemon.

**p!pokemon --legendary** | Displays your legendary Pokemon.

**p!pokemon --mythical** | Displays your mythical Pokemon.

**p!pokemon --ultrabeast** | Displays your ultra beast Pokemon.

**p!pokemon --alolan** | Displays your alolan Pokemon.

**p!pokemon --galarian** | Displays your galarian Pokemon.

**p!pokemon --hisuian** | Displays your hisuian pokemon.

**p!pokemon --nickname** <Nickname> | Displays your specific Pokemon with that nickname.

**p!pokemon --level** <Value> | Displays your Pokemon with that level.

**p!pokemon --level** < / > <Value> | Displays your Pokemon In-between that filter.

**p!pokemon --iv <Value> or --iv < / > <Value>** | Displays your Pokemon with or In-between that filter.

**p!pokemon --hpiv/attackiv/defenceiv/specialattackiv/specialdefenceiv/speediv <Value> or --hpiv/attackiv/defenceiv/specialattackiv/specialdefenceiv/speediv < / > <Value>** | Displays your Pokemon with or In-between that filter.

**p!pokemon --type** <Type name> | Displays your Pokemon of that type.

**p!pokemon --triple/quadra/penta** <Value> | Displays your Pokemon with triple/quadra/penta max iv (31) or min iv (0). Value = 31/0
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Trading!
description:
How to trade Pokémon, redeems and credits on the bot.

**p!trade @User** | Begins a trade with someone. They will then have to do p!accept to do the trade or p!deny to reject it.

**p!p add** <Pokemon numbers, seperated by spaces> | Add one or multiple Pokemon to your trade offer.

**p!p remove** <Pokemon numbers, seperated by spaces> | Remove one or multiple Pokemon from your trade offer.

**p!c add** <Amount> | Add credits to your trade offer.

**p!c remove** <Amount> | Remove credits from your trade offer.

**p!r add** <Amount> | Add a redeem to your trade offer.

**p!r remove** <Amount> | Remove a redeem from your trade offer.

**p!confirm** | Confirm the trade, both users must confirm for the trade to go through.
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Market!
description:
How to buy and sell pokémon using the market.

**p!market search** <Page number> | Show the requested page of the market.

**p!market search** <Page number> <Search Options> <Order Option> | Search the market.

**p!market view** <Pokemon ID> | View detailed information for a Pokemon on the market.

**p!market info** <Pokemon ID> | Alternative to view.

**p!market list** <Pokemon Number> <Price> | List a pokémon on the market.

**p!market buy** <Pokemon ID> | Buy a Pokemon from the market. You will need to confirm your purchase with p!confirmbuy or cancel it with p!cancel.

`
**p!market remove** <Pokemon ID> | Remove one of your Pokemon from the market.

**p!market listings** <Page number> | Display the Pokemon you have listed on the market.

**Order Options**

--order id ascending/descending | Order results by Pokemon ID.

--order lvl ascending/descending | Order results by Pokemon level.

--order price ascending/descending | Order results by price.

--order iv ascending/descending | Order by the sum of the Pokemon's IVs.

--order name ascending/descending | Order results by name.
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Search Options!
description:
Search options for market searching.

**--name** <name> | Search for Pokemon by name

**--level** <level> or < / > <level> | Search for Pokemon by level.

**--holding** <holding> | Search for Pokemon by the item they are holding.

**--type** <type> | Search for Pokemon by type.

**--price** <price> or < / > <price>  | Search for Pokemon with a specific price.

**--hpiv** <IV> or < / > <IVl> | Search for Pokemon by their HP IV.

**--atkiv** <IV> or < / > <IV> | Search for Pokemon by their Attack IV.

**--defiv** <IV> or < / > <IV> | Search for Pokemon by their Defense IV.

**--spatkiv** <IV> or < / > <IV> | Search for Pokemon by their Special Attack IV.

**--spdefiv** <IV>or < / > <IV> | Search for Pokemon by their Special Defense IV.

**--speediv** <IV> or < / > <IV> | Search for Pokemon by their Speed IV.

**--shiny** | Search for shiny Pokemon.
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Shop and Others!
description:
Shop commands and some misc commands.

**p!shop** | Opens the shop menu. You can purchase XP Boosters, Rare Candies, Rare Stones, Evolution Items, Nature Modifiers, Held Items, and Mega Evolutions!.

**p!buy** <Item ID> | Purchases an item from the shop.

**p!dropitem** | Drops the item which your current Pokemon is holding.

**p!mega** | Command to evolve Pokemon to a Mega X or Y. You must have a Mega Evolution purchased, they cost 1,000 credits each.

**p!release** <Pokemon Number> | This will release a Pokemon. .release will attempt to release your selected Pokemon, confirmation prompt will be displayed beforehand.

**p!recycle** <Pokemon Number> | This will recycle the number of Pokemon. By recycling, the selected pokemon level ups.

**p!fav** | This will show a list of your favorite Pokemon!

**p!addfav** <Pokemon Number> | Adds a Pokemon to your favorites list.

**p!removefav** <Pokemon Number> | Removes a Pokemon from your favorites list.
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Duelling!
description:
How to duel with your pokémon.

**p!select** <Pokemon Number> | This will be the Pokemon you use in battle.

**p!moves** | Displays your selected Pokemon's current moves, and the available moves it can learn.

**p!learn** <Move> | Attempts to learn the move you've chosen. You will need to choose which move you want to replace.

**p!replace** <Number> | Replaces a current move with the one you are trying to learn.

**p!duel** <@Username> | Challenges the select Discord user to a Duel. Be sure to @ them and not just type in their name.

**p!accept** | Accepts a duel if you've been challenged.

**p!use** <Move Number> | Your selected Pokemon will use the move that is listed by that number.
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Raid!
description:
Create your own powerful teams and beat the raid boss along with your friends.

**p!raid spawn**| Spawns a raid. A normal raid can be spawned every 3 hours, while event raids (which can only be done on weekends) cost 1 wishing piece. You can use p!r spawn as an abbreviation.

**p!raid join** <id> | Allows you to join a raid. p!r join <id> can be used as an abbreviation.

**p!raid leave** | Allows you to leave a raid. p!r leave can be used as an abbreviation.

**p!raid start** | Allows you to start the raid. This command can only be used by the leader of the raid!. p!r start can be used as an abbreviation.

**p!raid info** | Allows you to view the raid you are currently in. p!r info can be used as an abbreviation.

**p!raid duel** | Allows you to duel the raid boss. Once in a duel, you can use p!team to view your current team, p!use <move number> to use a move and p!switch <number> to switch pokemon.

**p!raid kick** | Allows you to kick a member in the raid you are currently in. This command can only be used by the leader of the raid. p!r kick <number> can be used as an abbreviation.

**p!raid ban** |  Allows you to ban a member in the raid you are currently in. This command can only be used by the leader of the raid. p!r ban <number> can be used as an abbreviation. This permanently kicks the user from the raid. The user cannot be unbanned.

**p!raid profile** | Allows you to view all the difficulties of raid bosses you have defeated. p!r profile can be used as an abbreviation.

**p!raid dex** | Allows you to view all the raid bosses you have defeated. p!r dex can be used as an abbreviation.

**p!raid eventdex** | Allows you to view all the gigantamax raid bosses you have defeated. p!r eventdex can be used as an abbreviation.

**p!raid cancel** | Allows you to cancel your raid battle in between. p!r cancel can be used as an abbreviation.
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Auction!
description:
How to join the global auction, buy and sell special pokémons.

**p!auction search** | Search Pokémons that are being auctioned. p!auc search or p!auc s can also be used.

**p!auction view** <ID> | View detailed information of a pokémon on the auction house. p!auc view <ID>, p!auc info <ID> , p!auc i <ID> are alternatives for this command.

**p!auction list** <Pokémon Number> <buyout> <time> | List a pokémon on the auction house. (Time format: XhYmZs).

**p!auction bid** <ID> <credits> | Bid on a pokémon from the auction house. p!auc bid <ID> <credits> can be used as an abbreviation.

**p!auction listings** | Display the pokémons you have listed on the auction house. p!auc listings can be used as an abbreviation.

**p!auction claim** <ID> | Claim a completed auction. Can be used by auctioneer or auction winner after the auction has ended. p!auc claim can be used as an abbreviation.
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Bot commands!
description:
Bot commands and server commands.

**p!botinfo** | Shows general bot information.

**p!invite** | Gives the bot's invite link.

**p!donate** | Sends a link to donate to support the bot.

**p!server** | Sends an invite to the bot's official server.

**p!appeal** | (Official Server Only) Attempts to give you unbanned from the official server if you were banned for a reason.

**Server Commands**

**p!setprefix** <prefix> | Sets server prefix.

**p!redirect** <#Channel Name> | If you want Pokemon to spawn in a certain channel you can use this command to change it.

**p!redirect disable** | If you want to enable spawns in all channels again, you can use this command.

**p!channel enable/disable** | Enables or disables p!commands in the channel you are currently in.

**p!levelup enable/disable** | Enables or disables level up alerts.

**p!clearspawns enable/disable** | Enables or disables the deletion of spawn message once a Pokemon is caught.
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Creating Team
description:
This command is used to create team for raid.
Note: You can only create 30 teams

Syntax: `p!teamcreate` --name _<team-name>_ --id _<pokemon-id>_

Example: `p!teamcreate` --name myteam --id 1 2 3
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Creating Team
description:
This command is used to create team for raid.
Note: You can only create 30 teams

Syntax: `p!teamcreate` --name _<team-name>_ --id _<pokemon-id>_

Example: `p!teamcreate` --name myteam --id 1 2 3
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Editing Team
description:
This command is used to edit previously created team.

Syntax: `p!teamedit` _<slot-id>_ _<pokemon-id>_

Example: `p!teamedit` 6 23
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Selecting Team
description:
This command is used to select a created team.

Syntax: `p!teamselect` _<team-id>_

Example: `p!teamselect` 2
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Deleting Team
description:
This command is used to delete created team.

Syntax: `p!teamdelete` _<team-id>_

Example: `p!teamdelete` 3
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Displaying Teams
description:
This command is used to display all teams you have.
Note: `Teams` and `Team` are different.

Syntax: `p!teams`

Example: `p!teams
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Displaying Current Team
description:
This command is used to display currently selected team.
Note: `Teams` and `Team` are different.

Syntax: `p!team`

Example: `p!team
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Displays TMS
description:
This command is used to display TM moves selected pokemon or given pokemon.

Syntax: `p!tms [_<pokemon-name>_]`

Example#1: `p!tms bulbasaur  --> Shows TMS of Bulbsaur
Example#2: `p!tms` --> Shows TMS of selected pokemon.
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Displaying Weakness
description: This command is used to display weakness of a pokemon/move.
Syntax: `p!weak <pokemon-name> or <move-name>`
Example#1: `p!weak bulbasaur --> Shows weakness of Bulbasaur
Example#2: `p!weak tackle` --> Shows information of tackle.
footer: Need more help? Join the official server by using the p!server command!

title: Use command
description:
This command is used to make a move in duel or raid.

Syntax: `p!use <move-number>`

Example: `p!use 2
